Enums/LogLevel.html.name: LogLevel
Enums/LogLevel.html.abstract: Represents different logging levels for the extension SDK

Classes/SFNotificationServiceConfig.html.name: logLevel
Classes/SFNotificationServiceConfig.html.abstract: The log level used for notification service extension. The default is .none.

Classes/SFNotificationServiceConfig.html.name: shouldShowCarouselThumbnail
Classes/SFNotificationServiceConfig.html.abstract: Indicates whether a thumbnail should be displayed for carousel notifications. The default is true.

Classes/SFNotificationServiceConfig.html.name: init(logLevel:shouldShowCarouselThumbnail:)
Classes/SFNotificationServiceConfig.html.abstract: Initializes the notification service configuration with a specified log level.

Classes/SFContentExtensionConfig.html#/c.name: logLevel
Classes/SFContentExtensionConfig.html#/c.abstract: This determines the verbosity of log messages generated within

Classes/SFContentExtensionConfig.html#/c.name: timeoutIntervalForRequest
Classes/SFContentExtensionConfig.html#/c.abstract: The timeout interval for network requests. Default value is 15 seconds.

Classes/SFMCNotificationViewController.h.name: -sfmcProvideConfig
Classes/SFMCNotificationViewController.h.abstract: Override and implement this method to provide custom configuration, if needed. - see: SFContentExtensionConfig.

Classes/SFMCNotificationService.html#/c:.name: -sfmcProvideConfig
Classes/SFMCNotificationService.html#/c:.abstract: Override and implement this method to provide custom configuration option.

Classes/SFMCNotificationService.html#/c:.name: -sfmcDidReceiveRequest:mutableContent:withContentHandler:
Classes/SFMCNotificationService.html#/c:.abstract: Processes incoming push notifications and allows custom modifications.

Classes/SFMCNotificationService.html.name: SFMCNotificationService
Classes/SFMCNotificationService.html.abstract: The primary class for handling notification service extensions.

Classes/SFMCNotificationViewController.h.name: SFMCNotificationViewController
Classes/SFMCNotificationViewController.h.abstract: The base class for notification content extensions.

Classes/SFNotificationServiceConfig.html.name: SFNotificationServiceConfig
Classes/SFNotificationServiceConfig.html.abstract: The configuration class for the notification service which provides configuration options for notification service extension,
